fullText: Catherine Zeta-Jones makes a commanding Broadway debut in this handsome revival of Stephen Sondheim's masterpiece, though her vocals are more stylish than stirring.
dtliExcerpt: Catherine Zeta-Jones makes a commanding Broadway debut in this handsome revival of Stephen Sondheim's masterpiece, though her vocals are more stylish than stirring.
